pages.text: Nezvazhayuchy na doskonalo utvorene nebo
Vy prodovzhuyetesya posperechatysya pravda
Deviating zvidty yavlyayutʹ soboyu deviators
Prykroshchi do falsifiers
U yikh blundering, vony ye povnistyu neuvazhni
Vony dopytuyutʹ Denʹ Vyroku
denʹ vony ye prysutni do vohnyu
Kushtuyutʹ retribution; tse ye yaki vy zvychayno kydaly vyklyk
spravedlyvyy zasluzhyly park ta pruzhyny
Vony otrymuyutʹ yikhni vynahorody Lorda, dlya vony zvychayno buly nabizhni
Ridko zrobyly vony splyatʹ vsya nich
U svitanku, vony molylysya za forgiveness
chastyna yikhnikh hroshey bula vidkladena dlya zhebraka ta needy
zemlya ye povna znakiv dlya tsykh khto ye pevnyy
Ta v mezhakh sebe; vy mozhete pobachyty
U nebesakh ye vashe zabezpechennya, ta vse shcho obitsyayetʹsya do vas
Lordom nebes ta zemli, tse ye takyy virnyy yak toy fakt, shcho vy rozmovlyayete
vy vidznachyly istoriyu Abraham pochesnykh hosti
Vony vidvidaly yoho, kazhuchy, "Myr." Vin skazav, "Myr do vas, neznayomtsiv
Vin poprosyv yoho rodynu pidhotovyty zhyrnu lytku
Koly vin zaproponuvav tse yim, vin zauvazhyv, vy ne hostytesya
Vin harbored strakh z nykh. Vony skazaly, "Ne mayutʹ strakha," ta vony daly harnu novynu knowledgeable syna
Yoho druzhyna bula zdyvovana. Vidznachayuchy yiyi zmorshchyv oblychchya: "YA ye sterylʹna stara zhinka
Vony skazaly, 'Takym "chynom skazaly vashoho Lorda. Vin yavlyaye soboyu Naybilʹsh Mudryy, Omniscient
